title: How to Catch Mewtwo Without Beating the Elite Four

steps.title: Go to the Route west of Lavender Town, and save just in case.
steps.content: Go to the Route west of Lavender Town, and save just in case.

steps.title: Walk up to the Gambler standing at the end of the Route, but immediately press Start while stepping.
steps.content: Walk up to the Gambler standing at the end of the Route, but immediately press Start while stepping .

steps.title: Choose to fly away to a Route where there is a trainer you have not beaten yet.
steps.content: Choose to fly away to a Route where there is a trainer you have not beaten yet.

steps.title: Walk up to the trainer and you have to win; otherwise the cheat will break.
steps.content: Walk up to the trainer and you have to win; otherwise the cheat will break. Also, make sure there is at least one space between you and the trainer when he notices you, or the game will freeze.

steps.title: Do not go in any tall grass after you beat that trainer!
steps.content: Do not go in any tall grass after you beat that trainer! Now, fly to a place where you can find some wild Ditto.

steps.title: Once you find Ditto, switch to the Pokémon with a special stat of 131.
steps.content: Once you find Ditto, switch to the Pokémon with a special stat of 131. Beat the Ditto.

steps.title: Fly back to Lavender Town and head back to the Route with the Gambler.
steps.content: Fly back to Lavender Town and head back to the Route with the Gambler.

steps.title: The menu screen will pop up.
steps.content: The menu screen will pop up. Press B to close it.

steps.title: Suddenly, a Mewtwo will appear.
steps.content: Suddenly, a Mewtwo will appear. Catch it, and congrats! You caught Mewtwo!
